g.text: Used for adding two single bits. Cannot handle carry input.
Adds three bits: A, B, and carry input. Essential for multi-bit addition.
Subtracts two single bits. D = A - B. Bo = 1 when A < B.
Performs D = A - B - Bin. Essential for multi-bit subtraction.
Cascaded full adders enable addition of multi-bit binary numbers with parallel processing.
